subdisciplines.name: Articulatory phonetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how speech sounds are produced by the human vocal tract.

subdisciplines.name: Acoustic phonetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical properties of speech sounds, such as frequency, amplitude, and duration.

subdisciplines.name: Auditory phonetics
subdisciplines.description: The study of how speech sounds are perceived by the human ear and brain.

subdisciplines.name: Experimental phonetics
subdisciplines.description: The scientific study of speech sounds using experimental methods.
